passages.text:
//The bartenders hands are constantly in motion. Polishing the bar, cleaning glasses, topping off the small furry person at the end of the bar. Only one hand seems to never leave her coatpocket. She raises an eyebrow at you, but says nothing.// 


[["The strongest drink you have!" ->StrongestDrink]]

[["What's good?" ->WhatsGood?]]

[["Uhm, a drink please?" ->DrinkPlease]]

[[Say Nothing. ->AwkwardWaiting]]
passages.name: BarApproached

passages.text:
One glass of the strongest stuff you have, please!

[[Continue. ->StrongStuff]]
passages.name: StrongestDrink

passages.text:
What do you recommend?

[[Continue.->ForYouBruised]]

[[Continue.->ForYou]]
passages.name: WhatsGood?

passages.text:
Uhm, I'd like a drink please.

[[Continue. ->WeakDrink]]
passages.name: DrinkPlease

passages.text:
//You stand at the bar, awkwardly avoiding eye contact with the bartender by fiddling around with your hands.//

[[Continue. ->YouGoingTo]]
passages.name: AwkwardWaiting

passages.text:
//The bartender nods and grabs a black bottle from the highest shelf. She pours a greenish liquid into metal cup, where it fizzles and steams as it settles down. 

She puts the cup in front of you.//

[["Down the hatch!" ->DownTheHatch]]

[[Toast her and take a sip. ->SipSip]]

[["Huh. What is this?" ->WhatIsThis?]]

links.name: Toast her and take a sip.

passages.name: StrongStuff

passages.text:
Do you want something to drink or do you just want to stand around? 

[["Uhm, yeah, a drink please." ->WeakDrink]]
passages.name: YouGoingTo

passages.text:
Down the hatch!

//You empty the cup in one swift motion. The liquid burns as it travels down your throat and for a moment, you'r worried that it's some sort of plant-killer. You cough for a bit, and wipe away tears, feeling warmth spreading through your body.//

[["Pretty good, another!"->AnotherStrongOne]]

[["That's some good stuff."->GoodStuff]]
passages.name: DownTheHatch

passages.text:
//You take a sip, and the liquid burns your throat. You manage not to cough however. After a moment, you take another, and slowly start to enjoy the burning sensation. //

[["I like it." ->PrettyNice]]
passages.name: SipSip

passages.text:
Ah, what is this? It looks dangerous.

[[Continue. ->YouWanted]]
passages.name: WhatIsThis?
AnotherStrongOne

passages.text:
That's some good stuff! 

[[Continue.->Unexpected]]
passages.name: GoodStuff

passages.text:
Anotherl one, ish you'd be s'kind!

[[Continue.->FOOL]]
passages.name: ANOTHER

passages.text:
//She fills the cup again, but as you lift it up it slips between your fingers. The cup clanks down and the liquid sprays over the counter and yourself. It sizzles as it burns holes into your clothing. Your head is spinning and you have a hard time holding yourself upright.//

[[Continue. ->Ending]]
passages.name: FOOL

passages.text:
//The bartender cleans up your mess, and you somehow manage to book a room, before falling asleep.//

{Epilogue}
passages.name: Ending

passages.text:
Wouldn't have expected you to like that.

[["I'm tougher than I look."->TougherThanILook]]
passages.name: Unexpected

passages.text:
I'm tougher than I look!

[[I'm a cowboy. ->I'mCowboy]]

[[So, hows business?->Business?]]
passages.name: TougherThanILook

passages.text:
I'm a cowboy, the names Jessie.

[[Continue. ->BertaSerious]]

[[Continue. ->BertaDisbelieve]]

[[Continue. ->BertaLaughs]]
passages.name: I'mCowboy

passages.text:
So, how's business? Bar seems kind off empty.

[[Continue. ->EveryonesScared]]
passages.name: Business?

passages.text:
A cowboy, eh?  //She looks you up and down, then nods approvingly.// You look the part.

I'm Berta.

[["I'm looking for work."->LookingForWork]]
passages.name: BertaSerious

passages.text:
//The bartender looks you once over, and raises an eyebrow.//

Alright. 

[["No, I'm serious!"->NoReally]] 

[["I'm looking for work." ->MisInfoWork]]
passages.name: BertaDisbelieve

passages.text:
I'm looking for work, by the way.

[[Continue. ->Don'tKnowSeb]]
passages.name: LookingForWork

passages.text:
Yep. Whole towns 'voidin this place today. You haven't heard?

[["Heard what?" ->Heard What?]]

[["Oh yeah, of course." ->OhYeaaah]]
passages.name: EveryonesScared

passages.text:
Heard what?

[[Continue. ->ThereWillBe]]
passages.name: Heard What?

passages.text:
Oh yeah, sure I heard! 

[[Quickly switch the topic. ->TopicSwitch]]
passages.name: OhYeaaah

passages.text:
There's gonna be a duel tomorrow, and today's when the troublemakers goin' arrive in town. And they will come here, they always do.

[["A duel?!" ->ADuel?]]
passages.name: ThereWillBe

passages.text:
A duel? Wow! Between who?

[[Continue. ->BillyAndJane]]
passages.name: ADuel?

passages.text:
Between Billy and Jane, who else? You' been livin' under a rock?


[["Oh wow, Billy and Jane?!"->OhWow]]
passages.name: BillyAndJane

passages.text:
Oh wow, Billy the Tit AND Jane Hicks Adams?! I hadn't heard. It's actually my first time in town.

[["I'm a cowboy" ->I'mCowboy]]
passages.name: OhWow

passages.text:
Sorry, not much going on at the moment. 

[[Continue.->BackToWork]]
passages.name: Don'tKnowSeb

passages.text:
//She gives you a long look.//

You know, Sebastian might have something for ya, and if he doesn't, he probably knows someone who could use some help.

He's bound to come down soon, I'll send him your way.

[[Thanks! ->ThankYou!]]
passages.name: BackToWork

passages.text:
Thank you! 

[[Continue. ->EndOfConversation]]
passages.name: ThankYou!

passages.text:
That's pretty good, I like it.

[[Continue. ->Unexpected]]
passages.name: PrettyNice

passages.text:
I'm a cowboy, by the way. The name's Jessie.

[[Continue. ->BertaSerious]] 

[[Continue. ->BertaDisbelieve]] 

[[Continue. ->BertaLaughs]]
passages.name: TopicSwitch

passages.text:
You wanted the strongest drink we have.

[[True. ->True]]
passages.name: YouWanted

passages.text:
True.

//You surrepticiously move the cup away from you.//

[["So... how's business?" ->Business?]]

[["I'm a cowboy, by the way." ->TopicSwitch]]
passages.name: True
BertaLaughs

passages.text:
No really! I am!

[[Continue. ->Somehow]]
passages.name: NoReally

passages.text:
//The more you protest, the more she doesn't take you seriously. After a little bit of back and forth, you simply go quiet, eyeing your drink.//

[[Give up trying to convince her. ->LookIGetIt]]

links.name: Give up trying to convince her.

passages.name: Somehow

passages.text:
Look, I get it. I mean, I don't get why you commit to it so hard, but I get that times are hard, boys need to, yeah, put themselves apart. But you overdo it a little.

[[Continue.->ListenILike]]
passages.name: LookIGetIt

passages.text:
Listen, kid, I like you. Once Sebastian comes down here, I'll send him to you, okay? He knows his way around the town, and can probably help you out some, getting the hang of it. You do have the body for it, so don't worry too much.

[[ ->ThanksIGuess]]
passages.name: ListenILike

passages.text:
Thanks, I guess.

[[Continue. ->EndOfConversation]]
passages.name: ThanksIGuess

passages.text: {SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: EndOfConversation
ForYou

passages.text:
//She looks you once over, lingeirng on your bruised face. Then she gets out a bottle from under the counter and pours you a small glass of amber liquid.//

It's strong, but you look like you might appreciate it.

[[Take a sip. ->SipOfWhiskey]]

[["Down the hatch!" ->WhiskeyFail]]
passages.name: ForYouBruised
Beer

passages.text:
//You take a sip of the liquid. It burns a little and has a smokey afterflavour, but not entirely unpleasant.//

[["Not bad." ->WhiskeyIsOk]]
passages.name: SipOfWhiskey
WhiskeyFail
WhiskeyIsOk

passages.text:
Yeah, and I'm looking for work.

[[Continue. ->BertaMisunderstands]]
passages.name: MisInfoWork

passages.text:
//The bartender tips against the side of her nose with one of her mechanic arms.//

I hear ya'. 

Sebastian can probably help you out, I'll send him your way when he comes downstairs. Shouldn't be long.

[["Thanks?" ->ThanksIGuess]]
passages.name: BertaMisunderstands
WeakDrink
WaterDrink

passages.text:
Uhm... I meant a real drink, not water.

[[Continue. ->Beer]]
passages.name: RealDrink

passages.text:
So, uhm... what's your name?

[[Continue. ->Berta]]
passages.name: WhatYourName

passages.text:
Berta.

[["Ah. I'm Jessie" ->I'm Jessie]]

[["How are you?" ->HowAreYou?]]
passages.name: Berta

passages.text:
Ah, I'm Jessie.

[[Continue. ->AwkwardSilence]]
passages.name: I'm Jessie

passages.text:
I'm Jessie. How are you?

[[Continue.->Fine]]
passages.name: HowAreYou?

passages.text:
Fine.

[["I'm a cowboy." ->I'mCowboy]] 

[[Avoid further conversation. ->Avoid]]
passages.name: Fine
AwkwardSilence

passages.text:
//You avoid eye contact and slowly move away from the bar.//

[[Continue. ->EndOfConversation]]
passages.name: Avoid
